reviews.review_msg: Dr. Anderson is genuinely one of the best professors I've ever had. She's easily accessible through email and she explains the content extremely well and makes science palatable and understandable to social science students. As long as you attend lectures, you'll be fine. She's an extremely fair grader and is very clear about what she wants.

Best prof at SFU. When it comes to entomology Dr. Anderson is probably the most knowledgeable person in all of Canada. Really interesting hearing her stories of real cases. Labs are easy, mostly just identifying bugs with a microscope with detailed step-by-step instructions for every assignment. Exams are tough but are online, take-home, open book.
Awesome prof, she really loves what she does and her lectures are easy to follow.
Honestly the best professor I've ever had. Not only is she the most qualified woman in forensics in Canada I know but her lectures are so intriguing and she has so many cool stories.

Such an expert on forensic entomology. Very kind person. Course is bit hard, but easy to understand overall. Read those readings and the textbook. Her ppt is too brief to understand, if u don't pay attention in class.
